name: Coder Simulator
description: The game is conceived as a very simple programmer simulator in the form of a clicker. The gameplay of the game is to make money by clicking on the keyboard, and by purchasing upgrades, you can increase the amount of money you receive. There are also passive ways to make money in the form of buying improvements such as "develop a game", "develop a software", etc. At the moment, version 0.1a (closed alpha) is ready
